name: 應用光學
restrict: ◎限大四 ◎限碩一碩二碩三以上修習
description: 本課程為光學原理與應用簡介，使學生能了解光的特性及其光學原理、元件與系統的運用觀念與技術，並作為光學量測、影像顯示與全像術等應用研究之學科基礎
goals: 瞭解光的特性與光的傳播特性
學習光學元件與系統特性、原理及其運用方法與技術，學習光學應用相關方法與技術
認識光學量測、影像顯示與全像術應用個案研究
syllabus:
1\. Introduction  
2\. Rays and the Foundations of Geometrical Optics  
3\. Review of Elementary Ray Optics  
4\. Imagery by a Single Surface and a Thin Lens (I)  
5\. Imagery by a Single Surface and a Thin Lens (II)  
6\. Gaussian Optics (I)  
7\. Gaussian Optics (II)  
8\. Putting It All Together (I)  
9\. Putting It All Together (II)  
10\. Gaussian Optics of Optical Instruments and Components (I)  
11\. Gaussian Optics of Optical Instruments and Components (II)  
12\. Introduction to Aberrations  
13\. Computation of Primary Aberrations (I)  
14\. Computation of Primary Aberrations (II)  
15\. Computation of Primary Aberrations (III)  
16\. Aberratons of a Thin Lens in Air  
17\. Presentation  
18\. Final exam

methodologies.note: 以講義講述應用光學內容
部分鏡頭會以光學軟體操作說明
